title: Securing Your AI Agent Infrastructure
excerpt: Best practices for implementing enterprise-grade security in computer use agent deployments.
content:
Security is paramount when deploying AI agents in enterprise environments. Here's how to do it right.

## Security Principles

- Defense in depth
- Least privilege access
- Regular security audits
- Incident response planning

## Implementation

1. Secure authentication
2. Encrypted communications
3. Access controls
4. Audit logging
5. Regular updates

## Compliance

Ensure your deployment meets relevant compliance requirements.

## Monitoring

Implement comprehensive monitoring to detect and respond to security threats.
author: Marcus Johnson
